resume.description:
I'm a Software Engineer searching for a job in Edinburgh.
I'm interested in Web development and DevOps. My main goal is being able to design largely distributed applications.
While waiting to get enough experience and skills for that, I'm a Web Developer.
I'm used to learn new frameworks and languages in my personal and professional projects. I also like to follow the new tools and trends in IT as they appear.

experiences.title: Information Technology Engineer
experiences.description:
Main developer in a project team for Aeronautic projects
Development and use of SAP API Endpoints to automate management of issues in plane factories
Multiple languages and technology use

experiences.title: Analyst Programmer
experiences.description:
Developer in a team in SAP projects for multiple clients in Europe
ABAP development for Airbus and Latécoère projects
Modification of projects in SAP XMII, Javascript and Bootstrap, need for a capacity to quickly adapt to new projects and needs
